synopsis.text: Shibuya Psychic Research (SPR) is on the hunt for paranormal activity, and their newest recruit is none other than Mai Taniyama, a high school student with a penchant for telling ghost stories. When Mai stumbles upon Kazuya Shibuya, the head of SPR, investigating a haunted school building, she finds herself in the midst of danger. To save Mai, Kazuya's assistant is injured, leaving Mai with no choice but to take up the role of Kazuya's assistant. As she delves deeper into the world of the supernatural, Mai discovers her own latent abilities and joins forces with a team of ghost hunters to unravel the mysteries of the paranormal. With state-of-the-art technology and her newfound powers, Mai is in for an adventure of a lifetime. Will she be able to uncover the truth behind the hauntings, or will she become the next victim of the unknown? Join Mai and the SPR team as they take on the world of the supernatural.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
